name: GMB Wrist Prep
description: A comprehensive wrist warmup routine including: Finger pulses, palm pulses, side-to-side palm rotations, front-facing elbow rotations, side-to-side wrist stretch, rear-facing wrist stretch (palms down), rear-facing wrist stretch (palms up), rear-facing elbow rotations, and forward-facing wrist stretch. Do as many reps as needed.
